name: Mirror Hag
description: The Mirror Hag is a Medium-sized fey creature with a knack for chaotic deception, possessing a true form that can disturb and incapacitate foes.
memorable: Her ability to confuse and manipulate enemies sets her apart, particularly through her unique 'Confounding Ugliness' ability.
goals: Usually seeks to incapacitate or manipulate humanoid creatures for her own amusement or designs.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures and can be encountered alongside other hags.
environment: Typically found in enchanted woods or locations imbued with magical properties.
strengths: Possesses exceptional constitution and immunity to charm and fright effects, making her durable and resistant to crowd control.
weaknesses: Average in physical attributes and can be countered if creatures successfully save against her abilities.
attacks: The Mirror Hag can perform debilitating melee attacks with her bite and claw, each dealing both piercing/slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Confounding Ugliness can incapacitate humanoids who witness her true form, disrupting their actions.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing her to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
additional_information: Immune to being charmed or frightened.
Can cast spells without material components, enhancing her tactical flexibility.
Can curse enemies, corrupting their forms with debilitating effects.
Utilizes deceptive abilities like disguise self to manipulate appearances.
spellcasting: Casts spells like disguise self and ray of enfeeblement at will, and dispel magic and locate creature once daily.
test_queries: hag with incapacitating abilities and curses
